name: Doors [Hotel+Update] Recreation v1.4
description:
As you can probably see this project was made in Scratch!

It is my best game yet!!!

This is a recreation of the popular game Doors

Progress bar only shows in fullscreen

You have to get through 100 doors 

The entities are: Rush, Ambush, Screech, Figure, Seek,  Eyes,  Jack, and Halt

Click flag twice

-----CONTROLS----

•WASD to move 

•C to crouch

---------NOTES------

Click flag twice

The Jeff shop is on a random door

same with Figure noises 

door counter is inaccurate
